column5: The Condo -A-Go-Go is located on the edge of the Ghost Town and is close to many places of interest. It is located on private property with plenty of privacy and parking, just one mile from the Famous Terlingua Ghosttown. Big Bend National and State Park are only a 6 minute drive each. There is an awesome semi-private dry creek bed with beautiful canyons for hiking that's several miles in length and starts just outside your front door.  This Luxury Motorcoach has it all.
